title: Who are the founders of Big Think and what is the story behind it? - Quora

response.answer_text: Peter Hopkins (yours truly) and Victoria Brown co-founded the site in 2007 and it launched in 2008.  Here's an article from around that time that provides more details.  In the mean time, we will be beefing up our about page so our background doesn't seem quite so mysterious... http://www.nytimes.com/2008/01/07/technology/07summers.html?pagewanted=all
